title: No home should be without a copy of this timeless classic!
review: This has to be the greatest musical of all time. An amazing musical score and stunning choreography, no home should be without a copy of this timeless classic.This musical is known by everybody and is suitable for all ages. A Happy family film with no sex, violence or bad language. The young actors playing the roles of the von Trapp children are amazing and Andrews gives a performance to be remembered for a lifetime as Maria, a young Nun who becomes a cheerful governess.This is definately a family movie to be watched together on a Sunday Afternoon!!

title: Good Comments
review: The Lion King is a very good film for adults or children. It features an excellent storyline and a brilliant musical soundtrack. The characters are well thought out and the animation is amazing. Well worth buying. Definately ten out of ten!
